page.title: 19Fiona Jackson's Saturday.
page.content: On a Saturday when I wake up I lay in bed for about 20 minutes thinking "I'm glad its not school".When I get up I sit and watch television whilst eating my toast which I have for my breakfast.Then I get dressed.Sometimes I take the dog a walk and sometimes I clean up.I go up to Chapel Point beach and round the village centre with the dog.Then we have a quick snack lunch.After lunch I play with my brother or sometimes I help my mum with the pots and then sit down and read.Sometimes i might go and play with my freind.I play with Kay Winson most of the time.We play Monopoly or racing outside she wins because shes older than me.When it gets dark I come in from playing."My mum says so".When I come in I have a big cooked meal then I watch television.I go to bed at 9.00.,not cleaning my teeth.
